item.title: Ansible Core
item.description: The moment I learned the true power of Ansible in any form was the thresehold I would say is the absolute starting point of the Intermediate phase of my career. I had heard of Ansible, Chef and Salt on Reddit but never thought important. After all, one machine in a vacuum hardly seems like something that needs help containing. When I finally got in a production environment and needed to be able to have full control of my fleet is when I started taking it serious.
